name: Time never stops
description:
In this fast-paced platformer, you'll move through three distinct 'Acts', completing each of the levels in, (hopefully), under ten seconds! These acts include: [Colorful Caverns, Cloudy Mountains, and Danger City]!

Currently, the game only features these three acts although I plan on adding more smaller 'challenge' levels, that have their own self-contained, yet equally fitting theme to them. When I finish this I'll also add a proper level selection screen, separate from the act select screen seen in the current build!

Game by SplendidDog

Music by Russell Hodges

Created using:

The GODOT game engine - General game development

Aseprite - Art
